Subject: Government of Armenia
Object: National Program on Energy Efficiency and Renewable Energy
Description: Government of Armenia policy is to promote energy efficiency in all economic sectors according to definitions formulated in the Law on Energy Efficiency and Renewable Energy (2004), and as articulated in the National Program on Energy Efficiency and Renewable Energy (2007).
